channel.title: OR-Tools on See Hiong's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in OR-Tools on See Hiong's Blog

item.title: Solving Facility Location Problem with OR-Tools and Micronaut
item.description: This post demonstrates solving the Facility Location Problem (FLP) using OR-Tools and Micronaut. It covers defining the solver, variables, constraints, and objective function in Java. The implementation includes creating a Micronaut service and controller to handle file uploads, process the data, and compute the optimal solution. The example input file format and expected outputs are also illustrated, providing a complete guide to implementing and testing the FLP solution.
